shopPage.title: Shop
shopPage.randomText: Unlock a note from a random date
shopPage.randomMonthText: Unlock a random note from the selected month
shopPage.noteText: Unlock a note from the selected date

tutorialPage.firstText:
Write something about your day and select your mood.
The notes will not readable until the new year.
tutorialPage.secondText:
At the end of the year you will be able to read all your notes.
Or you can also use some tokens to unlock your notes before the end of the year.

You'll earn 1 token every time you write the today note.
You'll also earn 7 tokens every time you make a 7 combo, that is when you write a note every 7 consecutive days.
tutorialPage.thirtText:
A partner is someone that can see your mood calendar and also see all your unlocked notes.
You can also send your partner a notification to remind her/him to write a note.
tutorialPage.fourthText:
We are going to ask for your permission to send you push notification.
We will use it to update data from your partner.

shopPageInfoDialog.title: How to obtain tokens?
shopPageInfoDialog.text:
You'll earn 1 token every time you write the today note.
You'll also earn 7 tokens every time you make a 7 combo, that is when you write a note every 7 consecutive days.
